snippet.title: Bad Parenting 1: Mr Red Face - Face terrifying supernatural phenomena & try to protect your family!
snippet.description:
Download for free on itch.io https://2oo2.itch.io/bad-parenting-1?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Mr. Red Face, a fictional character created by adults to teach their children. It's said that he often appears late at night to give gifts to well-behaved kids. But is the story of Mr. Red Face really that simple?

Ron, the main character of the game, who will witness the suffering that Mr. Red Face brings to his family.

➡️ More from 2OO2 https://2oo2.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More horror games https://itch.io/games/tag-horror?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames #horror
